mapper.select: select pmb.* ,project.project_name,project.project_no ,sc.staff_no,sc.staff_name, pms.join_datetime,pms.change_time,pms.old_salary,pms.new_salary,pms.curr_salary,pms.description from personnel_monthly_base pmb inner join personnel_monthly_salary pms on pmb.id = pms.id inner join tb_staff_costs sc on pmb.staff_id = sc.staff_id left JOIN tb_project project on pmb.project_id = project.project_id where pms.id = #{id}
mapper.update: update personnel_monthly_salary set join_datetime=#{join_datetime}, change_time=#{change_time}, old_salary=#{old_salary}, new_salary=#{new_salary}, curr_salary=#{curr_salary}, description=#{description} where id=#{id}
